title: Roasted Rosemary Potatoes (Pinch of Yum–Inspired)
description: Crispy, fluffy Yukon gold baby potatoes roasted high-heat with steam, then finished with a rosemary-garlic butter. Inspired by Pinch of Yum’s dill potatoes from their Sheet Pan Salmon recipe.
instructions: On a sheet pan, toss the potatoes with olive oil and kosher salt. Add 1/2 cup water directly to the pan.
Roast for 30 minutes, stirring every 10–15 minutes to prevent sticking. The water will steam off and the potatoes will begin to brown.
Optional: If potatoes need more color, lower the oven to 400°F and roast an additional 10–15 minutes, stirring as needed. Watch closely to avoid burning.
Combine melted butter, grated garlic, and chopped rosemary.
Remove potatoes from the oven and spoon the rosemary-garlic butter over the hot potatoes. Toss to coat and serve.
notes: Inspired by Pinch of Yum’s dill potatoes from their Sheet Pan Salmon recipe: https://pinchofyum.com/sheet-pan-salmon-with-dill-potatoes
